title: Sun-Soaked Santorini Greek Island Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
Discover the spellbinding beauty of Santorini with a stay at the luxurious Sea Sound White Katikies, perched on the Greek island's shimmering southern coastline. Set across 33 private acres on the seafront, between the beaches of Perivolos and Vlychada, this Aegean-style hotel is blissfully tucked away from the crowds. Find yourself within easy reach of vivid Perivolos and Perissa, with their charming restaurants, eclectic shopping and vibrant nightlife.

Be awed by the classically Greek blues and crisp white backdrop of this luxurious boutique hotel. Spend your days stretched out by the glittering outdoor pool, or relax in your suite or villa for the ultimate in privacy - each comes with a veranda overlooking the Aegean Sea. Dial up the relaxation with an indulgent massage overlooking the shimmering aquamarine waters of the sea, or treat yourself to a cocktail or two.

vendor_name: Sea Breeze Santorini Beach Resort, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Santorini Five-Star Resort on Idyllic Private Beach with Daily Breakfast & EUR50 Daily Dining Credit
description:
Onyx sand and jewelled waters lap the shoreline of Sea Breeze Santorini Beach Resort, Curio Collection by Hilton, where ancient historical sites are a stone’s throw away and Cycladic architecture defines the landscape. Relaxation is a therapeutic endeavour, with skilled beauticians offering holistic treatments at Euphoria Spa, while sparkling swimming spots beckon from your doorstep. Wander down to the resort's idyllic private beach and relax under umbrellas and sunbeds accessible only by its guests or visit the imposing beach of Vlychada or the picturesque seaside town of Perissa, home to a stunning black sand, volcanic beach that has to be seen to be believed. 

Treasure every delicate moment while adventuring through ancient ruins and become captivated by innovative Mediterranean cuisine at the highly awarded Aura restaurant, presenting an ambrosial menu designed by master chefs for an unforgettable island escape. The Aegean Sea views from the restaurant are guaranteed to take your breath away.
location_description: Sea Breeze Santorini Beach Resort, Curio Collection by Hilton
offer_address: Sea Breeze Santorini, Exomitis, Santorini 847 03, Greece

title: Adronis Concept Wellness Resort, Santorini - Ultra Lux July 25

title: Santorini Private Jacuzzi or Pool Suites with Sea Views, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Sunset Cocktails
description:
Discover new levels of Greek luxury in the suites of this five-star escape perched only a five-minute walk from Oia's picturesque town centre, perfect for those spectacular Santorini sunsets.

Spend your days stretched out by one of the six outdoor pools, or stick to your suite for the ultimate privacy - each comes with a veranda overlooking the Aegean and an outdoor jacuzzi or private pool.

Dial up the relaxation at the award-winning Anassa Spa or invigorate mind and body in the fully equipped fitness centre. Reward yourself with the Mediterranean cuisine of Alios Ilios restaurant or sip on a cocktail or two at the Akratos Poolside Bar - wherever you choose, the sunset is bound to be spectacular.
location_description: Santo Pure Oia Suites and Villas

title: Boutique Santorini Clifftop Escape in Medieval Pyrgos Village with Daily Breakfast & Traditional Greek Dinner
description: Discover why the Greek islands are one of the world's most popular holiday destinations with a blissful escape at Kastro Mansion. Needing no introduction, the hotel's locale of Santorini boasts a spectacular landscape, sandy beaches, sapphire waters, soaring mountains, cliffs and gorges - not to mention the sunsets that set the sky ablaze. This boutique hotel is tucked away in the medieval village of Pyrgos, a UNESCO World Heritage site, and with its elevated position, you'll be treated to incredible views over the caldera. Fall in love with the Mediterranean lifestyle: spend your days lounging in sunshine, exploring beautiful cultural monuments and indulging in evenings filled with delicious food and wine, before returning to your contemporary suite for a heavenly night's sleep.
offer_address: Epar. Od. Pirgou Kallistis - Profiti Ilia 10, Pirgos Kallistis 847 00, Santorini, Greece

title: Santorini's Only Beachfront Resort with Onsite Beach Club, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Nestled near Santorini’s famed volcanic sand beaches lies a luxurious five-star retreat tailored to the most discerning travellers. Seamlessly blending avant-garde architecture with awe-inspiring vistas of the Aegean Sea, this boutique resort beckons honeymooners and leisure enthusiasts seeking unparalleled rejuvenation.

Hop between the black sands of Monolithos Beach and the outdoor pool, visit the nearby Ancient Thera archaeological site or work up a thirst only quenched by cocktails at the swim-up bar.

Embrace serenity at sophisticated Nikki Spa before turning things up a notch at the world-renowned Nikki Beach Club, where resident DJs provide your soundtrack to summer. Sample light, fresh and creative fare at Nikki Beach Restaurant's all-day bistro and watch the sun set over the Aegean each evening.

title: Five-Star Santorini Private Pool Suites with Daily Breakfast, Massages & EUR100 Dining Credit
description: Cherish the Cycladic mystique of stunning Santorini at the five-star Andronis Arcadia Hotel, part of Preferred Hotels' L.V.X. Collection, which celebrates upscale luxury with local flair. On the fringe of Oia's whitewashed walls and surrounded by the azure Aegean Sea, this secluded Greek Eden boasts spacious, elegant suites each with their own private infinity pool facing the sea. Savour gastronomic delights with a feast of Mediterranean and Japanese flavours at Pacman Restaurant, or epicurean dining at Beefbar. Melt into bliss at Evexia Spa, enjoying full spa access, including the signature reflexology pools. With everything you need for a serene escape, Andronis Arcadia Hotel is the perfect place to enjoy a slice of paradise.

title: Santorini Beachside Glamour with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Exclusive Beach Access
description:
You’re invited to cross the sunken caldera and discover five-star bliss at the brand-new Radisson Blu Zaffron Resort Santorini. See yourself magnificently backdropped by sweeping views of iconic black sands, whitewashed houses and the dazzling Aegean seaside. Perfectly positioned in the heart of picturesque Kamari Village, this resort offers true Greek island luxury that’s uniquely Cycladic-chic -  think Italian flourishes and world-class dining facilities. Savour sushi or paninis poolside, sip your way around the world at the resort’s magnificent Wine Bar or head to Zeffirino Restaurant for a taste of the famed Italian chain’s legendary Genoese pesto.

Savour sun-soaked days exploring Kamari Village’s countless delights - including ancient Greek ruins, taverna-lined boardwalks and Santorini’s only open-air cinema - then return to laze by the resort’s lavish pool or exclusive slice of the island’s most beloved beach.
offer_address: Apollonos and Makedonias Streets, Kamari, Santorini 84700, Greece

title: Luxury Santorini Private Infinity Pool All-Suite Retreat with Daily Breakfast & EUR100 Resort Credit
description:
This boutique resort is a dream come true, blending upscale luxury with soothing relaxation in perfect harmony. Imagine it as your personal paradise, where you can sip a drink in your private infinity pool while enjoying the stunning views of Santorini’s iconic caldera.

When it comes to pampering, this resort spares no expense. Enjoy world-class beauty and wellness treatments at Kallos Spa, from rejuvenating massages to invigorating yoga sessions. Afterwards, head to Throubi Restaurant, where Greek Mediterranean cuisine shines with dishes crafted from fresh local ingredients, all while enjoying romantic sunset views from the dining terrace.

Located on the magnificent Santorini, the Andronis Concept Wellness Resort is your gateway to discovering the island’s magic. Wander through the charming streets of Oia or Fira, where white-washed buildings and sweeping views of the volcanic caldera and the Aegean Sea make you feel like you’ve stepped into a living postcard.

title: Sun-Soaked Santorini Escape with Daily Cocktails
description:
Escape to the immaculate coast of Santorini at Iliovasilema Hotel & Suites, built 350 metres above sea level for unbeatable sunset views. Overlooking Imerovigli village and the islands of the Aegean Sea, this exclusive escape is the perfect base from which to explore the spectacular beauty of the Mediterranean.

Your package includes daily breakfast, a complimentary bottle of wine and fruit basket on arrival, a welcome drink of homemade lemonade and one daily cocktail per person.

title: Romantic Santorini Clifftop Suites & Villas with Daily Breakfast & Sunset Cocktails
description:
Your ultimate Greek Island fantasy awaits at Iliovasilema Hotel & Suites, perched 350 metres above the Aegean Sea on the volcanic cliffs of Santorini. Overlooking the dramatic Caldera and nearby volcanic isles, this Cycladic-style retreat is your front-row ticket to the region's endless horizons and golden sunsets.

Soak up never-ending vistas from your whitewashed suite or villa, unwind poolside or sip on sumptuous cocktails at the cliffside bar. Savour the taste of the Mediterranean at the onsite restaurant, where fresh ingredients are transformed into culinary masterpieces.

Just a short stroll from the charming village of Imerovigli, you'll find yourself surrounded by Santorini's iconic blue-domed churches, traditional tavernas and boutique shops. For nature lovers, the island's distinctive black sand beaches and volcanic trails are within easy reach.

title: Five-Star Santorini Jacuzzi or Pool Suites with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Sunset Cocktails
description: Discover a new level of Greek luxury at Santo Pure Oia Suites & Villas, a five-star escape located on the outskirts of the scenic Oia village, overlooking the expansive Aegean Sea and the world-famous Santorini sunsets. Spend your days stretched out by one of the six outdoor pools, or stick to your suite and villa for the ultimate in privacy - each comes with a verandah overlooking the Aegean Sea and an outdoor jacuzzi or private pool. Dial up the relaxation with a raki-based spa ritual at the award-winning Anassa Spa or invigorate mind and body in the fully equipped gym. Reward yourself with Mediterranean-fusion cuisine at Alios Ilios Restaurant or sip on a cocktail or two at the Akratos Poolside Bar - wherever you choose, the sunset is set to be spectacular.
location_description: Santo Pure Oia Suites and Villas

title: Five-Star Santorini Clifftop Suite Opulence with Jaw-Dropping Caldera Views
description: Experience unparalleled bliss enveloped by the velvet blue of the Aegean Sea, unbeatable views of the charming Caldera and impeccable five-star service on your next Santorini stay at the Canaves Oia Suites. Situated on the clifftops above the island's labyrinth-like alleys, this award-winning hideaway offers a world-class stay. Enjoy an intimate Mediterranean dinner on the spectacular Panorama Balcony, savour the finest Greek cuisine under the stars at Petra Restaurant or taste the region's finest wines with a wine tasting journey curated by Canaves Oia. Create memories to last a lifetime with those closest to you with a private yacht charter or indulge in a treatment in the calming caves of Canaves Oia Spa. Experience life's finest splendour within the Cycladic beauty of this opulent Santorini getaway.

title: Boutique Five-Star Santorini Clifftop Oasis with Caldera Views
description: Santorini Secret Suites & Spa is a dreamy, romantic, five-star oasis perched atop the sheer cliff faces of an ancient sunken volcano. Wander past picturesque traditional white buildings topped with blue-domed roofs, and explore the nearby town of Oia bursting with cafes, restaurants, boutiques and stunning churches. Make the journey down the dramatic cliffside to immerse yourself in the crystal-clear waters of the caldera or admire the sparkling views from the hotel's glistening infinity pool. Enjoy a refreshing cocktail by the Pool Bar or indulge in Greek and Mediterranean cuisine with a fine dining experience at Black Rock Restaurant.

title: Santorini Five-Star Oceanfront Luxury with Nikki Beach Club
description:
Moments from the famed volcanic sand of Santorini's beaches, you’ll discover Nikki Beach Resort & Spa Santorini, a five-star lifestyle destination for discerning travellers. Pairing cutting-edge architecture with breathtaking views over the Aegean, the boutique resort is a haven for honeymooners and hedonists looking for the ultimate in relaxation and rejuvenation. Just eight kilometres from Santorini’s capital, Fira, and six kilometres from Ancient Thera, it’s perfectly positioned for enjoying the very best of the Greek isle.

Just how you find your zen each day is up to you: spend hours hopping from the black sands of Monolithos to the 25-metre outdoor pool, working up a thirst only quenched by a cocktail from the swim-up bar. Embrace sensational serenity at the sophisticated Nikki Spa, before taking it up a notch at Nikki Beach Club, where resident DJs provide the soundtrack to smoothie-sipping and sushi roll-snacking. As the day rolls on, sample the blend of traditional Greek cuisine with a unique Peruvian style at the beachfront restaurant, Escape, or pop into the all-day bistro - Nikki Beach Restaurant - for light and fresh organic dishes. Finish every evening at the rooftop Soul Lounge, before retiring to your contemporary room or suite to do it all over again.

title: Santorini: Nobu Cliffside Romance with Daily Breakfast and Welcome Drink
description: Crystal-clear turquoise waters, steep cliff faces and whitewashed Cycladic architecture await at the boutique, five-star Nobu Hotel Santorini - home to yet another of the world-famous Nobu restaurants. This dreamy destination promises uninterrupted romance - from a lavish poolside daybed perch, watch as vibrant red and orange hues erupt from an Aegean Sea sunset each evening. At the full-service spa, therapists provide bespoke treatments designed to soothe mind and body, and the hotel's unique oceanfront location brings nature to your front door. Taste the iconic cuisine of Nobu Restaurant, which fuses classic Japanese dishes with South American flavours. The harmony found here simply cannot be matched.

vendor_name: Grace Hotel Santorini, Auberge Resorts Collection
title: Five-Star Santorini Retreat with Private Terrace Ocean Views & Michelin-Starred Restaurant
description: Cross the sunken caldera and embrace five-star island luxury with a stay at Grace Hotel, a modern cliffside sanctuary perched high above the dazzling Aegean Sea. There’s no better place to catch a spellbinding Santorini sunset than from your private terrace, and this extraordinary hotel offers that and much more. Perfect for honeymooners, romantics and dreamers, Grace Hotel is also an epicurean’s paradise, with onsite Varoulko Santorini effortlessly showcasing the island’s abundance of fresh produce and modern Greek gastronomy, mouthwateringly delicious enough to earn the restaurant a coveted Michelin star.

title: Award-Winning Santorini Private Pool Suites & Villas in Iconic Oia Town
description: Part of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection, Canaves Oia Epitome stands out among an ocean of extravagance in Santorini. Expect accommodation adorned in Cycladic whites with earthy volcanic stone features, and two sumptuous dining spaces offering freshly caught seafood from Ammoudi Bay, the iconic fishing cove dazzling below the resort. Boasting inventive cocktails and Aegean views, Elements and Omnia offer fine dining to a truly cinematic backdrop. Even the seamless infinity pool draws your eye out to the horizon, where Santorini’s most photographed town, Oia, clings to the caldera. With a world-class spa built inside a natural cave, offering famous Rassul mineral mud baths, and  private pools in each idyllic suite or villa, you couldn’t come closer to paradise.

title: Five-Star Santorini Escape with Clifftop Infinity Pool
description:
Allow yourself to be immediately spellbound by Santorini’s beauty with a tranquil stay at Katikies Garden Santorini - a five-star, converted monastery that is listed on the prestigious Leading Hotels of the World.

With rows of charming, white-washed houses, shimmering ultramarine waters, and magnificent nightly sunsets, Santorini provides the perfect backdrop for an escape to remember, and Katikies Garden Santorini's location in the centre of the capital, Fira, provides easy access to charming restaurants, eclectic shopping, and vibrant nightlife, all from a relaxing hideaway. Accessible only on foot via a long cobbled street, inside you'll find just 40 suites; romantic, fine-dining eatery, Selene Restaurant, wellness offerings at A.SPA, and an expansive infinity pool with dramatic ocean views. This has to be Santorini at its finest.
offer_address: Fira town, Old Catholic Monastery Fira Town, Santorini 847 00, Greece

title: Idyllic Cliffside Santorini Private Suite Stay with Panoramic Views over Ammoudi Bay
description: Carved gracefully into the cliffs of dreamy Santorini's Oia, right above the enchanting Ammoudi Bay, sits Santo Mine Oia Suites. Built on a former stone mine, each of the 37 suites making up this hideaway come with their own glistening private pools. Indulge in the local Greek cuisine while taking in incredible vistas over the Aegean Sea at The Sunset Restaurant, sip a botanical cocktail poolside or explore the wine cellar. For a touch of extra bliss, head to the spa for a rejuvenating treatment.

title: Five-Star Santorini Suites with Private Veranda & Jacuzzi
description: Discover a new level of Greek luxury in the suites and villas at Santo Pure Oia Suites & Villas, a five-star escape perched only a five-minute walk from the Oia's picturesque town centre - and Santorini's spectacular sunsets. Spend your days stretched out by one of the six outdoor pools, or stick to your suite and villa for the ultimate in privacy - each comes with a veranda overlooking the Aegean and an outdoor jacuzzi or private pool. Dial up the relaxation at the award-winning Anassa Spa or invigorate mind and body in the fully equipped gym. Reward yourself with the Mediterranean cuisine of Alios Ilios restaurant or sip on a cocktail or two at the Akratos Poolside Bar - wherever you choose, the sunset is set to be spectacular.
